concept.title: Orchestrate : Updating Conga Orchestrate's App Logo

conbody.p: This documentation only pertains to upgrading to Conga Orchestrate from ProcessComposer 12.13 and all earlier versions.

When upgrading to the latest version of the Conga Orchestrate, you must change the Conga Orchestrate App's logo to reflect current branding. Current Salesforce functionality does not allow the installed package to automatically update the logo. Follow the steps below to change the Conga Orchestrate application's logo in Lightning and in Classic after upgrading.
Before updating the Conga Orchestrate logo, ensure that you
